Main module

The Main module houses the main loop and some additional functions which are needed to control the drone

Main.keyboard_to_control(keys_pressed: list, control_value: int = 70)

Converts the pressed keys on the keyboard into the corresponding rc controls wich can be sent to tello, also handles takeoff and landing commands

Parameters:

  • keys_pressed – List of relevant keys pressed on the computer Keyboard

  • control_value – value of rc_control if key is pressed range from -100 to 100, negative values to invert

Returns:

The rc controls according to keys_pressed
